Teaches very well, but a little fast. A responsible professor, who really cares if students leaned through classes. But the handwriting should be improved, sometimes it is not clear enough, more often the words are too small.

民祐 was really diligent on helping us to understand the concept.
Maybe less calculus and more concept about economics and the really world will be better.

Teacher is so nice. If we have problem, he will do his best to make we understand. When we think we can't afford the exam, he will accept our opinion and improve his teaching methods in the next exam.
還是希望可以不只有板書當教材
老師教學認真
板書可以清楚有系統，不要鬼畫符然後也忘記自己要寫什麼

老師很可愛~上課也很用熱忱！但感覺想教給我們的東西太多了有點難以吸收
It would be better if you can make fine adjustments about the contents because some of them can't be explained clear enough. Thank you for teaching me!

Professor should care more about our learning degree, because not everyone have learned Microeconomics before, if professor teaches the field of Microeconomics, some of us will have no understanding and basic knowledge about them at all.
The color of the pen is too light and the words are too small
不要講一些課本都沒有也沒額外發資料還要考的東西

The professor is really patient and kind while answering our questions, but the pace and coverage of the course might be too fast, and advanced than necessary. I really hope that everyone who put effort into class can pass though. Thanks!
Teacher is very good~but I think maybe there can be more multiple choice questions in the test, and less graph drawing and explaining questions.
老師人很好，致力於與學生互動，也願意傾聽並採納學生意見，也樂於解決學生的問題。但授課內容並未照顧到學生的基本程度，有時為了趕進度會不知所云、板書雜亂，反而降低學習成效。希望上課內容與講解方式能夠再做調整。

老師辛苦了!
still hope homework can be less in one time.  
Pages of question in just one homework is kind of huge to finish in one shot.
Maybe cut it to more times, from 4 homework in one semester to 6 in one, sth like that may be fine.
老師以板書授課，非常用心，老師100%以英文授課且說得很流利、標準，教學很有熱忱，也樂於回答我們的問題，很有耐心，謝謝老師!
不要講一些課本都沒有也沒額外發資料還要考的東西
